link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: Array[Floor@ Total@ Flatten@ MapIndexed[#1 2^(#2 - 1) &, Flatten[Table[2^(PrimePi@ #1 - 1), {#2}] & @@@ FactorInteger@ DivisorSigma[1, #]]] &, 76] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 12 2020 *)
